item.title: Camel setting exchange headers in a custom dataformat
item.description: Apache Camel is a great framework with dozens (hundreds even) components, dataformats and expression languages. However one of the thing that makes Camel even greater is the various ways to provide your own customizations to these items. In this blog we are going to create a custom dataformat used in the marshal and unmarshal statements within a Camel route.
